name: Subway Bullet Train Simulator: Driving Experience
name_original: Subway Bullet Train Simulator: Driving Experience
description:
Prepare yourself for the fast moving action thrill of bullet train ride! This fast Subway Bullet Train Simulator: Driving Experience bullet train is the best train simulation railroad game on apple platform. In this game you have to travel through multiple train station which are located on fantastic sceneries and beautiful locations and become the perfect railway driver. Subway Bullet Train Simulator: Driving Experience features track changing environment in which you have to drive the metro train on rails. This game is very interesting for the metro train simulator lovers. Once you played this game you will be addicted till you complete and end this game. Stop the train before you enter the danger zone. Change the camera view as per your comfort, pick up all the passengers to drop at their respective destinations. You will experience a real engine driving skills. In this game you will experience this monster drive by yourself and you have to show your skills with full of fun and a real joy.
Be the best train driver & station master in this bullet train driving simulator. So what are you waiting for? Download this addictive Subway Bullet Train Simulator: Driving Experience 3D simulation game and start your career as a station master and end up as the best train driver in the town.
Special Features:
• Realistic Engine Physics
• High Resolution 3D Graphics
• Addictive and Challenging Missions
• Amazing Sound Effects
